interestingcomments.content: Reading RAW files into MATLAB/Python /!/ Has anyone successfully read the camer raw files into MATLAB/Octave/Python? I've got some images which I'd like to play around with.
interestingcomments.MarkedSent: Reading RAW files into MATLAB/Python /!/ Has anyone successfully read the camer raw files into MATLAB/Octave/Python? I've got some images which I'd like to play around with.

interestingcomments.content: A7RII plus Lightroom 6. Cannot Import ARW files. /!/ It keeps giving me the same error: The files are not recognized by the raw format support in Lightroom. I've seen solutions to use a DNG file converter but I can't/don't know how to even access them to do that. My computer reads the camera (A7RII) as PMHOME. The subfolders of PMHOME are INFO (empty) and LICENSE, has a bunch of .txt files in it. Provided there is a solution for me, should I not shoot in RAW only and Uncompressed? Thanks in advance
